4SN.F.long_name: MCI Capital Alternatywna Spólka Inwestycyjna S.A.
4SN.F.summary: MCI Capital Alternatywna SpÃ³lka Inwestycyjna S.A., formerly known as MCI Capital S.A. is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing direct and fund of fund investments. In direct investments, the firm specializes in mezzanine, early stage, growth capital, management buy-outs, leverage buy-outs, pre-IPO and PIPE transactions, majority investments and private debt. In fund of fund investments, the firm specializes in private equity and venture capital funds at growth, PE/LBO and private debt level. The firm prefers to invest in TMT, IT infrastructure, data centers and distributors, digital media, ecommerce, marketplace, fintech, IoT, adtech, SaaS, cloud and entertainment. It seeks to invest in CEE, Western Europe, Israel. The firm prefers to invest between EUR 5 million ($5.94 million) to EUR 100 million ($118.88 million).The firm prefers to exit its investments via reselling the company's shares or stocks to a strategic industry investor, financial investors, private investors, the company board, or by admitting the company to official stock-exchange listing (IPO). MCI Capital Alternatywna SpÃ³lka Inwestycyjna S.A. was founded in 1999 and is based in Warsaw, Poland. MCI Capital Alternatywna SpÃ³lka Inwestycyjna S.A. is a subsidiary of Czechowicz Ventures Sp z o.o.
